metadata.name: clone_sprite_swf_4
metadata.description: Tests CLONE_SPRITE opcode (0x24) - duplicateMovieClip operation with comprehensive edge case coverage including basic cloning, various depth values (positive, negative, zero), empty strings, and long sprite names
missing_features: Graphics rendering not implemented (requires display list and MovieClip infrastructure)
Actual sprite cloning only works with graphics support - NO_GRAPHICS mode validates parameters only
